entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
